ssot__PartyConsent__dlm.name: Party Consent
ssot__PartyConsent__dlm.description: The Party Consent DMO represents an individual's consent preferences.

ssot__ConsentCapturedContactPointType__c.description: The type of communication that an individual provided their consent preferences.

ssot__ConsentCaptureddateTime__c.description: The date and time when consent was given.

ssot__ConsentCapturedSource__c.description: The type of source where consent was retrieved, for example, a website.

ssot__ConsentCapturedSourceName__c.description: The specific name of the source where consent was retrieved.

ssot__ConsentGrantors__c.description: The relationship to the individual who granted consent.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EffectiveFromDate__c.description: The date when consent is in effect.

ssot__EffectiveToDate__c.description: The date when consent is no longer effective.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The short description of privacy consent record.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Privacy Consent DMO.

ssot__PrivacyConsentStatusId__c.description: A reference ID for the status of privacy consent, for example opted in or opted out.
